definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: The crown is decorated with a stunning black onyx cabochon.

sentences.english: They are gorgeously captivating and comparable to that of legendary cruisers, and customized choppers.

sentences.english: The product has the features of translucent, exquisite, pure white and gorgeous.

sentences.english: Your wedding veil is florid and neat tailored, where did you buy …

sentences.english: Rather than flashily smash against the wall, why not elegantly turn a corner? Give yourself the space to make a turnaround.
